name: Buzzer-Button
author: Buzzer.Best

sections.description:
This plugin enables you to display the Buzzer.Best button on your site. The plugin can easy implement with a shortcode. Shortcodes & Demo

Usage

Integrate the Shortcode [buzzer_button] (All Shortcodes) in WordPress and you get the Buzzer.Best in Spezial Mini Embed Version with Sound and Touch Effects and in different Colors. Easy to integrate. Use the Buzzer as Special CTA-Button or for Gamification in your Blog.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Stabil Version from the Buzzer Button.

1.1

  • Added Support for 10 New Buzzer and Shortcodes.

1.2

  • Integration of a List of all Shortcodes + Demo Website.

1.3

  • New Buzzer Size L now available. Six Large Size Buzzer with New Shortcodes.

short_description: Become a Buzzer Button in different Sizes and Styles.
